description:
Manual games allow you to set custom check locations and custom item names that will be rolled into a multiworld.
This allows any variety of game -- PC, console, board games, Microsoft Word memes... really anything -- to be part of a multiworld randomizer.
The key component to including these games is some level of manual restriction. Since the items are not actually withheld from the player,
the player must manually refrain from using these gathered items until the tracker shows that they have been acquired or sent.

idkman.description:
First Public Release
Survivors: Sonic, Tails, Knuckles, Amy, Eggman, Metal Sonic, Cream, Blaze and Silver
Executioners: 2011x, Tripwire and Kolossos
Maps: HILL, HILL.GYM, YCR, Angel Island and Darker Cavern
Goal: Beat Every Map as all characters
OUTDATED RELEASE
idkman.title: Version 0.2-1 v1

playmyrandomizer.description:
Added Shadow, Fleetway Super and Not Perfect
Survivors: Sonic, Tails, Knuckles, Amy, Eggman, Metal Sonic, Cream, Blaze, Silver and Shadow
Executioners: 2011x, Tripwire, Kolossos and Fleetway Super Sonic
Maps: HILL, HILL.GYM, YCR, Angel Island, Darker Cavern and Not Perfect
Goal: Beat Every Map as all characters
playmyrandomizer.title: Version 0.2 - Cancellation Release
